ygData.subject: RE: Purchase prices for quest components
ygData.msgSnippet: buying rights...  I know people were yelling that free carapaces and runes in CT and guk when they were killing the stuff. So dont go and spend your fortunes
ygData.messageBody:
buying rights... I know people were yelling that free carapaces and runes
in CT and guk when they were killing the stuff. So dont go and spend your
fortunes on every item, remember, if a group is just camping the items for
xp, means they all have the items allready or dont need em, so they couldnt
care less about em since they're all no drop except for the Lambent stones.
I say within a week you'll be able to loot everything for free practically
if the groups camping them is just going for xp

last night i saw 2 runes being givin away in CT but i was too far away in
the temple to make it there
and also a carapace in guk but every run we made there we had to gate out
because of people making trains of greater iced bones. and finally when we
got to the gargs, we killed 2 of em, and got no carapace.

People are leaving the shin leggings and shin gloves on the corpses of the
froggies. These are groups that cant go deep in the dungeon and just hunt
the zone line, where they pull tons of this stuff, thats where i got my shin
pants and my buddy looted some free gloves....

Minkin
Sol Ro
Level 35 bard


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rokenn Swiftsong [SMTP:rokenn@...]
> Sent: Thursday, October 14, 1999 3:51 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Purchase prices for quest components
>
> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
> >From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
> >Until I gain 4-5 more levels, the only way I will be able to acquire any
> of
> >the bard quest components is to purchase the looting rights from someone.
> >Because these are all new items, the market for them hasn't really been
> >established yet. As a result, I don't have a really good idea on how
> much
> >PP to offer for the looting rights. If anyone out there gets a quest
> >component by paying for the looting rights, request you post how much you
> >paid for it. That will give me and other bards in my situation a good
> >starting point in our negotiations.
> >
> >Thanks
> >Galtin of E'ci
>
> I can understand wanting to get Lambent armor as soon as you can.
> Personally though I do not plan on buying any of the components (except
> for
> the gems of course), why? Well nearly all the equipment I have, I have
> acquired by trading, purchasing, or as gifts from friends. For Lambent I
> want the satisfaction of killing and looting these items myself. If it
> takes me long longer then other folks so be it, but it's just what I feel
> is
> the right way to go.
>
> As for prices on some of the items, I would guess for the first few weeks
> the looting rights may be expensive. Also some of the items are not bad
> in
> there own right (most seem to be at least plate AC and some have small
> bonus). If you want to buy you way want to wait a week or two for the
> market to saturate. My guess may be in the 50 to 200 plat range depending
> on
> the item. Also remember that after 35th lvl or so most players stop
> caring
> about how much plat they have unless they are heavy into trade skills.
>
> Good luck!
>
> Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
> Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
> with the subject lol.
